title: Multiplication Property
text: The multiplication property of inequality: If $$a<b$$ and $$c>0$$, then $$ac<bc$$ if $$a<b$$ and $$c<0$$, then $$ac>bc$$

title: Applying the Multiplication Property
text: Our goal is to isolate x (have x on one side and numbers on the other side)

title: Applying the Multiplication Property
text: What number should we multiply to both sides of the inequality to isolate x?

title: Left Side
text: What is the left side after multiplying $$\frac{1}{3}$$?

title: Right Side
text: What is the right side after multiplying by $$\frac{1}{3}$$?
